REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C G L M T f0730 reute d f BC-CHINA-REPORTS-TALKS-B 04-03 0096

TEXT.TITLE: CHINA REPORTS BREAKTHROUGH IN TALKS WITH USSR
TEXT.BODY: After years of refusal, Moscow has agreed to discuss the problems of Afghanistan and Kampuchea in its talks with Peking on normalising relations, Chinese Vice-Foreign Minister Qian Qichen said. He told a news conference: "Recently the Soviet Union expressed agreement to discuss this question." China has long referred to three obstacles to better relations -- Soviet troops in Afghanistan, Moscow's support for Vietnamese troops in Kampuchea and Soviet troop concentrations along the Chinese border. Reuter
